file_content.text: I knew this day would come.
Everyone hoped the Sith would ignore us. But here you are, corrupting our planet.
Nobody wanted to believe you Imperials would invade. Yet here you are, come to taint our rich history.
The Empire's always looking for a new conquest. And here you are, a hired gun sent to tear down our legacy.
Our planet's too important to escape the Empire's gaze forever. And here you are, fouling us with your presence.
Corellia revolutionized the shipbuilding industry, pioneered hyperspace travel, founded the Republic. You will not ruin everything we've built.
Defiance will just burn more scars into Corellia.
You're only making this worse.
The Green Jedi have defended this planet from your kind for generations. We won't give in now.
Cutting through you Green Jedi is half the struggle, and all the fun.
I hoped you'd say that.
We're done suffering for your amusement.
Corellia's embarking on a new future with the Empire. I'm simply easing the transition.
Times are changing, Jedi.
A few fools here might buy that line, but I'm not one of them.
I'm handing the Empire the keys to the planet. What happens to Corellia is their business, not yours.
You don't have a say.
You've made a career from bowing to the Empire, but we won't do the same.
You're defending a planet infected with corruption. That's how the Empire gained a foothold.
Corellia's rotten to the core.
A few bad seeds don't ruin the whole. Simply remove the infection.
I'm here for your key to the enclave, not a history lesson.
Shut up and give me your code.
How did you know...? Ah... Darbin Sull. I'll deal with him later....
Protect the relics, men. Rid Corellia of this scum's presence!
Guard the relics, men. Wipe these intruders off Corellia!
